snippet: The State Senate passed legislation on Thursday allowing private adoption agencies to deny placements that conflict with their religious or moral beliefs, including opposition to homosexuality.
abstract: Virginia State Senate passes legislation allowing private adoption agencies to deny placements that conflict with their religious or moral beliefs, including opposition to homosexuality.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate passed legislation on Thursday allowing private adoption agencies to deny placements that conflict with their religious or moral beliefs, including opposition to homosexuality.

headline.seo: Virginia: Bill Allowing Adoption Restrictions Advances
headline.main: Virginia: Bill Allowing Adoption Restrictions Advances
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Bill Allowing Adoption Restrictions Advances
